statements: SELECT * FROM RobotProjects
SELECT project_name, milestone_date FROM RobotProjects ORDER BY milestone_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, resource_allocated FROM RobotProjects WHERE resource_allocated > 10000
SELECT project_name FROM RobotProjects WHERE milestone_date < '2022-05-01'
SELECT * FROM RobotProjects ORDER BY project_id
SELECT project_name, milestone_date, resource_allocated FROM RobotProjects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, resource_allocated, milestone_date FROM RobotProjects WHERE milestone_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RobotProjects WHERE resource_allocated BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY milestone_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_id, milestone_date, resource_allocated FROM RobotProjects WHERE resource_allocated < 2000 AND milestone_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT project_name, milestone_date FROM RobotProjects WHERE resource_allocated > 5000 ORDER BY project_name ASC, milestone_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RobotProjects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM RobotProjects WHERE completed = true;
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline FROM ProjectTasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, completed FROM RobotProjects WHERE start_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_name, end_date, completed, project_id FROM RobotProjects ORDER BY end_date, project_name;
SELECT * FROM RobotProjects WHERE completed = true;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM RobotProjects WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM RobotProjects JOIN ProjectTasks ON RobotProjects.project_id = ProjectTasks.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT task_name, task_description, deadline, assigned_to FROM ProjectTasks WHERE deadline < '2023-06-01' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM RobotProjects LEFT JOIN ProjectTasks ON RobotProjects.project_id = ProjectTasks.project_id GROUP BY project_name, start_date;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_timelines;
SELECT * FROM milestones WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT MAX(allocation_date) AS latest_allocation_date FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines WHERE project_name LIKE '%development%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM resource_allocation;
SELECT * FROM project_timelines WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project_timelines ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE project_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resource_name, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_timelines JOIN milestones ON project_timelines.project_id = milestones.project_id WHERE milestone_date > start_date;
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_name, due_date FROM Milestone WHERE status='pending';
SELECT resource_name, role FROM Resource WHERE availability=true;
SELECT project_name, end_date, status FROM Project WHERE status='in progress';
SELECT * FROM Project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM Project WHERE status='Active';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT Project.project_name, Milestone.milestone_name, Milestone.due_date FROM Project JOIN Milestone ON Project.project_id = Milestone.project_id;
SELECT * FROM robots ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, year_manufactured FROM robots WHERE type='Android';
SELECT name, type FROM robots WHERE year_manufactured > 2010;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, milestone_name, milestone_date FROM milestones WHERE completed = true;
SELECT * FROM robots ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, year_manufactured FROM robots WHERE type = 'Android' ORDER BY year_manufactured DESC;
SELECT r.name AS robot_name, p.name AS project_name, a.quantity FROM robots r INNER JOIN allocations a ON r.id = a.resource_id INNER JOIN projects p ON a.project_id = p.id;
SELECT MAX(year_manufactured) AS max_year FROM robots;
SELECT p.name AS project_name, COUNT(a.resource_id) AS total_resources FROM projects p LEFT JOIN allocations a ON p.id = a.project_id GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY total_resources DESC;
